sentences.en: A chemist can analyze water into two colorless gases, hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.cn: 化学家能将水分解成无色气体氢和氧.

sentences.en: A chemist can separate a medicine into its components.
sentences.cn: 化学家能把一种药物的各种成分分解出来.

sentences.en: Chemist stores upped sales by 63 percent.
He recruited another nucleic acid chemist, a young Pakistani, Dr. Rao Sastri.
sentences.cn: 他又找来一名核酸化学家, 叫作拉奥·萨斯特利的年轻的巴基斯坦人.

sentences.en: I got this medicine at the chemist's shop.
If you ever get any ailments there's no problem as he is like a walking chemist's shop.
sentences.cn: 如果你有了什么病痛，不用着急，他就是个药铺子。

sentences.en: She went into a chemist's and bought some aspirin.
sentences.cn: 她进了一家药店，买了些阿司匹林。

sentences.en: She worked as a research chemist.
The chemist analyzed the new tonic and found it contained poison.
sentences.cn: 药剂师对这种新补药作了化验分析,发现有毒.

sentences.en: The chemist made a mistake when making up the prescription.
The chemist reduced water by electrolysis.
sentences.cn: 化学家用电解法把水还原为氢.

sentences.en: The chemist reported on his experiments with coal tar.
sentences.cn: 化学家提出他实验沥青的报告.

sentences.en: There are many creams available from the chemist which should clear the infection.
sentences.cn: 很多能够消除这种感染的药膏在药店就能买到。

sentences.en: There's a chemist's shop not a hundred miles from Dumfries.
sentences.cn: 这儿有一家离邓费利斯不远的药店.

sentences.en: You will have to take your prescription to a chemist.
sentences.cn: 你得拿着处方去找药剂师。

words.tran_cn: 化学受体；[生理] 化学感受器（等于chemoceptor）

trans.tran_en: a scientist who has special knowledge and training in chemistry
